tasks.label: Compile and Push
tasks.command: if [[ "${fileExtname}" == ".java" ]]; then echo "Compiling: ${fileBasename}" && javac -d out "${file}" || exit 1; else echo "Skipping compile (not a .java file): ${fileBasename}"; fi && git stash push -m tempstash && git pull --rebase && git stash pop || true && git add . && if ! git diff --cached --quiet; then git commit -m "Added ${fileBasename}" && git push; else echo "No changes to commit."; fi
